comment: This was the easiest class Ive taken at KSU. She gives you 12 discussion posts, but you only have to do 4 of them. Theres 3 tests total and you have to visit a museum (theres one on campus) to submit a discussion post on. She responds to emails quickly and all of the discussion posts are based on the textbook/slideshows.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof. Hutchinson is a true gem. She has a heart of gold! She gives clear instructions and is always ready to help. You only have to do 4 discussion posts, 3 tests, and museum attendance/paper. Very easy class. TAKE HER!!

If you're worried about 3D design at all then you want to take Hutchinson's class. She's very helpful and knowledgable. However, she goes through instructions fast so pay attention. I thought it was going to be my least favorite class, but Hutchinson made it my favorite of the semester.

Only have to do 5 discussions, and you get to pick which ones. Otherwise, only 3 tests and a museum visit. Very easy class, textbook can be helpful for your tests and museum visit, but could get by without it. Didn't communicate with her much, but seemed nice in her emails.

I have mixed feelings on her class, she was very organized online and expects you to read all the material about projects of course, I don't mind that at all. However, in practice, she can be a bit disorganized and talks a lot in class (to the point of losing precious time on projects). Despite this, I would recommend her she is very knowledgeable.

Great professor and super easy class. You only have to complete 4 discussion posts during the semester, 3 tests, and a museum visit. Her grading criteria is very clear and shes very sweet. If you need an easy A definitely take this class and this professor.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
